title: Shizuku’s Big Role!
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>♪~~~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>You seem to be in a good mood, Shizuku. Did something happen?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Ah, Eli-san. Yes, I’ve been entrusted with a big role!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>My, a new play? I’d love an invite.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufu, you’re going to be part of it, Eli-san♪ It seems that Mari-san and Honoka-san had an extremely fun test of courage experience, so they talked about how we should do another one utilizing Nijigaku’s school buildings. And I will be performing the last part of the show, the colossal ghost.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eh.... I-, is that so?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yeah. I’m really looking forward to it. Nijigaku’s buildings are spacious, so I think we can do lots of cool things in them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>....Has the school given you permission to do that? Safety must really be considered when planning such a big project like that. I’ll be making sure everything is good, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Safety, huh....? I’ll pass that to Shioriko-san. Thank you for the advice, Eli-san! Good day!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Ah, wait! Shizukuuuu~! ....And she’s gone. That wasn’t supposed to be advice....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
